Gov. Inslee extends pause of reopening phases in Washington state Link: https://mynorthwest.com/2019839/inslee-pause-reopening-phases-washington/

Gov. Inslee announced Tuesday that the pause on reopening will remain until at least July 28. Counties will not move forward to the next Safe Start phase.
